price: 150. C’est Allah Qui est votre Maître et c’est Lui votre meilleur allié.
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهُ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلنَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: bali al-lahu mawlākum wahuwa khayru al-nāṣirīna
